00036 void IElements::Button::draw(InterfaceLayer* IL)
00037 {
00038 
00039     GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->enableBlending();
00040 
00041     Colour drawColour;
00042 
00043     char* m_drawStr = 0;
00044 
00045     if (m_mouseDownOverElement == true)
00046     {
00047 
00048         m_drawStr = m_mouseDownText;
00049         drawColour = m_btnDownBg;
00050 
00051     }
00052     else if (m_mouseOverElement == true)
00053     {
00054 
00055         m_drawStr = m_mouseOverText;
00056         drawColour = m_mouseOverBg;
00057 
00058     }
00059     else
00060     {
00061 
00062         m_drawStr = m_buttonNormalText;
00063         drawColour = m_normalBg;
00064 
00065     }
00066 
00067 
00068 //    IL->nullActiveTexture();
00069 
00070  //   IL->setActiveColour(drawColour);
00071 
00072     unsigned int l_uiLeftLength = 30; //10 pixels for the left
00073     unsigned int l_uiRightLength = 30; //10 pixels for the right
00074 
00075     unsigned int l_uiTopHeight = 5;
00076     unsigned int l_uiBottomHeight = 5;
00077 
00078     unsigned int l_centerHeight = height - l_uiTopHeight - l_uiBottomHeight;
00079 
00080     unsigned int l_centerLength = width - l_uiLeftLength - l_uiRightLength;
00081 
00082     IL->drawQuadWithUIElement(x, y, l_uiLeftLength, height, 0, 0);
00083 
00084     if ((l_centerLength > 0) && (l_centerHeight > 0))
00085     {
00086         IL->drawQuadWithUIElement(x + l_uiLeftLength, y, l_centerLength, l_uiTopHeight, 2, 0);
00087         IL->drawQuadWithUIElement(x + l_uiLeftLength, y + l_uiTopHeight, l_centerLength, l_centerHeight, 4, 0);
00088         IL->drawQuadWithUIElement(x + l_uiLeftLength, y + l_uiTopHeight + l_centerHeight, l_centerLength, l_uiTopHeight, 3, 0);
00089     }
00090 
00091     IL->drawQuadWithUIElement(x + l_uiLeftLength + l_centerLength, y, l_uiRightLength, height, 1, 0);
00092 
00093 //TODO: Some other way of pushing colour    IL->setActiveColour(m_textColour);
00094 
00095     IL->getDefaultTextRenderer()->Render(64, x + (width / 10) , y + height - (height / 4), width - ((width / 10) * 2), height - (height / 2), m_drawStr);
00096 
00097 
00098     GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->disableBlending();
00099 }

00101 void IElements::Button::handleButtonEvent(Input_Event e)
00102 {
00103 
00104     if (e.Event_Data[0] == MOUSE_DOWN)
00105     {
00106 
00107         onDown();
00108 
00109         m_mouseDownOverElement = true;
00110 
00111     }
00112     else if (e.Event_Data[0] == MOUSE_UP)
00113     {
00114         if (m_mouseDownOverElement == true)
00115         {
00116 
00117             onUp();
00118 
00119         }
00120 
00121         m_mouseDownOverElement = false;
00122     }
00123     else if (e.Event_Data[0] == MOUSE_MOTION)
00124     {
00125 
00126         m_mouseOverElement = true;
00127 
00128     }
00129 
00130 }

00137 void IElements::Button::onUp()

00145 bool IElements::Button::handleInput(Input_Event e)
00146 {
00147     bool m_Result = false;
00148 
00149     switch (e.Event_ID)
00150     {
00151     case input_event_button_one:
00152     {
00153         float event_x, event_y;
00154         event_x = e.Event_Data[1];
00155         event_y = e.Event_Data[2];
00156 
00157         bool m_Over = false;
00158 
00159         if (event_x > x && event_x < (x + width))
00160         {
00161             if (event_y > y && event_y < (y + height))
00162             {
00163                 handleButtonEvent(e);
00164                 m_Over = true;
00165             }
00166         }
00167 
00168         if (m_Over)
00169         {
00170             m_mouseOverElement = true;
00171         }
00172         else
00173         {
00174             m_mouseDownOverElement = false;
00175             m_mouseOverElement = false;
00176         }
00177 
00178         return m_Over;
00179 
00180         break;
00181     }
00182     }
00183 
00184     return m_Result;
00185 }
